content.raw:
Thanks for the changes. Allowing spaces on URIs is a recent addition, see pull request #110. Since we're not encoding URIs, that was needed in order to support URIs that have spaces, which is a common occurrence in Ignition Fuel (see [this model](https://staging.ignitionfuel.org/openrobotics/models/Cordless%20Drill) for example).

I agree that simply allowing spaces feels hacky, but without proper support for encoding, we need a way to support these URIs right now, so we can't just go back to forbidding spaces.
